HTTP Routing Table

/ | /admin | /booking | /cancel_booking | /change_password | /contact | /cookie_policy | /events | /faq | /favicon.ico | /js | /login | /logout | /privacy_policy | /register | /terms_of_service
 
/
GET / Homepage
 
/admin
GET /admin/update_events_weather Refresh weather data for all events.
POST /admin/config Update system configuration.
POST /admin/confirm_event Confirm a scheduled event.
POST /admin/delete_event/{event_id} Delete a scheduled event.
POST /admin/user/block Block or unblock a user.
POST /admin/user/delete Delete a user account.
POST /admin/user/role Change a user's role.
 
/booking
POST /booking Book a slot for an event.
 
/cancel_booking
POST /cancel_booking/{slot_id} Cancel an existing booking.
 
/change_password
GET /change_password Show the change password form.
POST /change_password Update user password.
 
/contact
GET /contact Contact page
 
/cookie_policy
GET /cookie_policy Cookie Policy page
 
/events
GET /events View events and booking slots.
POST /events Create a new event.
 
/faq
GET /faq FAQ page
 
/favicon.ico
GET /favicon.ico Favicon
 
/js
GET /js/admin.js Serve admin.js static script
GET /js/change_password.js Serve change_password.js static script
GET /js/events.js Serve events.js static script
GET /js/events_calendar.js Serve events_calendar.js static script
GET /js/user_accounts.js Serve user_accounts.js static script
 
/login
GET /login Display the login form.
POST /login Authenticate a user and start a session.
 
/logout
GET /logout Logout the current user.
 
/privacy_policy
GET /privacy_policy Privacy Policy page
 
/register
GET /register Display the registration form.
POST /register Register a new user.
 
/terms_of_service
GET /terms_of_service Terms of Service page
